title: VOLUMEN ATELIER — Bound for Centuries.
description: A luxury bookbindery landing page for the fictional brand VOLUMEN ATELIER. Deep aged-leather palette (#221510 bg) with leaf-gold accents, IM Fell English + Jost typography, Hero Type D split-grid with 4 stat counters (137 years / 4200 commissions / 23 materials / 6 masters) and 2×2 craftspeople portraits. Full sections: word-by-word manifesto reveal, materials Swiper carousel with provenance notes, numbered timeline process, portfolio masonry, master binder portraits, atelier split-screen, and bespoke commission inquiry form.
